attributes.action: Help lower income families and first time buyers by preventing letting companies buying up properties and renting out poorly decorated/furnished homes at top prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of living in the property market is spiralling uncontrollably and no-one seems to see that letting companies and opportunist landlords are buying up far too much property and letting out at often ludicrous prices very basic and often poorly decorated/furnished 'homes'  Lets get the market moving again and help the less able to afford a new home, the chance to buy at the lower priced end of the market and retore some pride in renovating and decorating their own investments.  Maybe we will see less run down areas needing endless grants from the goverment, many of which are not a million miles away from many of our homes.
